be.spacebel.webservice.authentication

Class AuthenticationServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.spacebel.webservice.authentication.AuthenticationServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthenticationService

    public class AuthenticationServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthenticationService
    The AuthenticationServiceImpl class implements the AuthenticationService interface, i.e. it defines the implementation of all authentication operations.
    Author:
    The Hoa Nguyen (tnn), Pierre Denis (pds)

      Checks the matching of the given user id and password in the user registry; if a matching user is found, then an encrypted SAML token with user's attributes is returned; otherwise (authentication failure), the exception report is returned to indicate the error's root cause.

      • RequestSecurityToken

        public org.apache.axiom.om.OMElement RequestSecurityToken(org.apache.axiom.om.OMElement rstElement)
        Description copied from interface: AuthenticationService
        Checks the matching of the given user id and password in the user registry; if a matching user is found, then an encrypted SAML token with user's attributes is returned; otherwise (authentication failure), the exception report is returned to indicate the error's root cause.
        Specified by:
        RequestSecurityToken in interface AuthenticationService
        Returns:
        DOM element containing the SAML token if authentication succeeds, null otherwise
